column5: Rick, move this as you choose, but I got bit by this pesky little bugger that tells me every 3 minutes that my p c is so badly infected that Mother T wouldn't even go near it.  Then it offers to fix my little problem for a very reasonable price, but with all these other benefits that I can't live without.  Avast picked it up, so let's see.   Anybody else see this piece of crap?  Gotta a story to tell?
yup sounds like spy shredder to me...
